// Pivot -26, -53
int spaceship[34] = {
	25, 0,

	7, -54,
	4, -50,
	4, -35,

	-4, -35,

	-25, 37,
	-18, 42,
	-18, 50,
	17, 50,
	17, 42,
	25, 37,
	25, -9
};
